name: MOCHA MANIA
description:
AVAILABLE NOW! MOCHA MANIA is a doughnut filled ode to the classic arcade games of the early 80's

Cuppa Joe has become over caffeinated and is wrecking havoc in the doughnut village. Take control of our doughnut heroes Maple and Glaze as they lure Joe into Mount Java and stop his coffee reign of terror before it's too late.

Collect the three key ingredients in each stage to help chill Joe out and progress to the next level!

  • Sugar - to sweeten him up
  • Cream - to mellow him out
  • Spoon - to stir it all up

Go solo for the high score, or bring a friend along and take turns climbing Mount Java, working together to boost your combined score!

Grab an umbrella and protect Maple and Glaze from the falling coffee. Be careful though! The powerup only lasts for a limited time. 

Discover 3 different bonus games to help boost your high score or even potentially gain an extra life! Rumor has it that you may even get to take control of Cuppa Joe himself.

Visit zachwinn.com or follow @zachwinnstudios on Twitter and Instagram for more information and updates on the release!
